text: And if you greet only your friends,Perhaps 4% of the Greek manuscripts have ‘brothers’, as in many versions. what are you doing extra? Do not even the tax collectors do so?The reference to “reward” and “extra” suggests that the procedures previously enjoined are demonstrations of practical righteousness—we are to be examples, rise above the level of the surrounding society. Tax collectors were Jews, part of the community, but despised as traitors.
